Translations.Text: Ba ƣaflat kasid sumoro az ito'ati Alloh faxr kardan ʙa ʙisjorii molu farzand
to ʙa gurho rasided va dar on co dafn suded
Na, in tavr ne, nasojad ki molhojaton sumojonro ʙa ƣaflat andozad ʙa zudi xohed donist, ki hajoti oxirat ʙarojaton ʙehtarast
Sipas hazar kuned, ki ʙa zudi oqiʙati ʙa dunjo masƣul sudanatonro xohed donist
Na, in tavr nest, agar az rui jaqin medonisted, hatman tezi mekarded ʙar nacot dodani nafshojaton az haloki
Sipas ʙa casmi jaqinas xohed did, ʙiduni sak
Sipas dar on ruz sumoro az tamomi ne'mathoi dunjavi ʙozxost mekunand
